Each pack contains up to 51 shaves so you can get the most out of your razors.
Breakthrough anti-clogging blade technology results in up to 60 percent less time rinsing** and up to 25 percent less strokes needed***
Four longer-lasting*, titanium-coated blades for a close and comfortable shave
Shaver for women with pivoting head, plus dual lubricating strips enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E for enhanced glide
body.description: Say goodbye to constant blade clogging and enjoy a smoother shave with BIC EasyRinse Refillable Women's Razors. BIC EasyRinse grooming products for women feature patented anti-clogging technology designed with the optimal amount of space between the blades for easy rinsing and less clogging and irritation. Each pack contains up to 51 shaves so you can get the most out of your razors. This four-piece razor kit with one EasyRinse refillable handle and razor refills is a great choice for a faster** shave — up to 60 percent less time rinsing** and up to 25 percent less strokes needed***. Each EasyRinse razor cartridge boasts four longer-lasting*, titanium-coated blades, a pivoting head and dual lubricating strips enriched with aloe vera and vitamin E. Shaving shouldn't be frustrating, so BIC EasyRinse women's razors make it easy to tame any unwanted fuzz, even long or coarse hair. Plus, this slim portable razor can also slip easily into travel kits or gym bags for a fantastic shave — whenever, wherever. Once you've used all your cartridges, hold on to your razor handle and purchase a pack of refill razor cartridges. Experience breakthrough technology at a price you are sure to love with BIC EasyRinse Refillable Shaving Razors for women — designed for a smooth, effortless shave with less rinsing, skin irritation and clogging. *Vs. BIC Sensitive. **Vs. BIC Flex 3. ***Vs. BIC Flex 5.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anti-Clogging Tech Designed with 30% more space between the blades* for easy rinsing and no clogging, enjoy a smoother shave with less irritation**. *Based on average distance between the blade edges vs. BIC Soleil Click 5 **vs. BIC Silky Touch A Faster Shave* Shaving shouldn’t take forever. Enjoy breakthrough anti-clogging technology that makes it easier to tame any unwanted fuzz, so you can live a life less clogged (starting with your shave). *Vs. BIC Soleil Click 3 Refillable Hold onto your BIC EasyRinse Razor Handle and swap in a razor blade refill whenever you need a fresh razor blade to tame your unwanted fuzz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really impressed with the quality of the shave
reviews.reviewText: These exceeded my expectations. I have used many types of razors over the years and the technology is getting better and better. I have been using the ones with the comfort glide on both sides to lessen ingrown hairs, red bumps, and cuts. So far, it has mostly worked. However, this was the first time using a pretty standard razor that none of that happened on the first try! The glide is smooth, got every hair, left nothing behind, no red bumps, no cuts (surprising!) and no goopy-ness after using (like the comfort strips often leave). These will work far better for travel because of that. But beyond that, the price point is better for 9 blades and a handle than what I have been paying for the "fancier" ones.The only thing that is weird is that image on the packaging shows the button on the front of the razor but it is in fact on the back. And the razor can be snapped in right side up and upside down, so that's a little odd. But because the shave was so good, I'll overlook these things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a good multi-blade razor!
reviews.reviewText: I have used several other razors with multi-blade heads that performed much worse than my old single and double-blade razors. I'd use them on my legs, then go out in the sun and see so many missed hairs glistening in the sunshine.This Bic razor is comfortable to hold and use, isn't slippery in my hand, and most importantly, it removes all of the hair!No more shaving twice. Yay!It really does rinse well, and I love how smooth my legs and armpits are after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At the cost of $6 (at the time of this review), this is a good set of razors from a trusted brand. The spacing on the blades does make it easier to rinse hair out of it. The size of the blade head is decent for more intimate areas, though I do feel it still falls a little short if that's the area of focus for you. This would be a good set to travel with too as the replacement blades come with their own individual covers. I like these a good bit and will definitely consider getting them again, especially over the other no-name brands of disposable razors that are available in a similar price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really does rinse well compared to other razors
reviews.reviewText: Works as a razor should and shaves/cuts relatively close (not as close to a men's razor) but feels all the same. The main benefit is it being cleaned easily from rinsing. Looks like the blades being slightly further apart make it easier to rinse off rather than getting stuck in gaps like my other razors.It feels a bit cheaper than other (more expensive) razors, but gets the job done especially for the price. Make sure to use plenty of shaving cream and wipe them dry after use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These razors surpassed my expectations. The smooth glide eliminated red bumps and cuts on the first try, unlike previous razors. They're perfect for travel due to their effectiveness and affordability. The handle is secure, though the button's position and blade orientation are a bit confusing. Despite this, the razor's performance is outstanding. It provides a gentle, effective shave with easy cleaning. Lubricating strips are somewhat stiff, but the blades remain unclogged. The reusable handle reduces waste, making it a great value. Overall, a reliable choice for a smooth, hassle-free shave on various body parts. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These work just like the other 4 blade razors I have tried in the past. The blades cut hair easily without cutting my skin, and it doesn't take a million passes to shave off the hair. It's gentle and effective. The handle is a good size, not too big or small and it's not flimsy feeling. The blade snap into the handle securely. I do wish it had the little button to eject the blade off of the handle, because trying to unsnap it is a little tricky. The cover slides easily back onto the blade while you are storing it so that you don't risk cutting yourself. The blades didn't get clogged with hair and soap and rinsed easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely rinses well
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I thought this “easy rinsing” claim was indeed a joke, but holy cow it really does rinse clean. You’re not fighting to get those last little hairs off that are stuck in the blades.This did give a pretty good shave. I did use a nice shaving product while using this razor, but this razor definitely stands out on its own.Easy to put the refill on too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use, and good value for money
reviews.reviewText: The Bic razor is easy to grip, since the handle is on the 'chunky' side. The blades come in a pack of three, and are very simple to install. The only downside to this set is that the packaging can't be easily resealed/closed (if you need to store everything while traveling), but that's a minor nitpick.
